name: CWEventDelegate
desc: The interface a Wi-Fi client object uses to notify its delegate about Wi-Fi events.

items.name: func bssidDidChangeForWiFiInterface(withName: String)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the current BSSID has changed.

items.name: func clientConnectionInterrupted()
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the connection to the Wi-Fi subsystem is temporarily interrupted.

items.name: func clientConnectionInvalidated()
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the connection to the Wi-Fi subsystem is permanently invalidated.

items.name: func countryCodeDidChangeForWiFiInterface(withName: String)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the currently adopted country code has changed.

items.name: func linkDidChangeForWiFiInterface(withName: String)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the Wi-Fi link state changed.

items.name: func linkQualityDidChangeForWiFiInterface(withName: String, rssi: Int, transmitRate: Double)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the link quality has changed.

items.name: func modeDidChangeForWiFiInterface(withName: String)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the operating mode has changed.

items.name: func powerStateDidChangeForWiFiInterface(withName: String)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the Wi-Fi power state changed.

items.name: func scanCacheUpdatedForWiFiInterface(withName: String)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the Wi-Fi interface's scan cache has been updated with new results.

items.name: func ssidDidChangeForWiFiInterface(withName: String)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the current SSID has changed.
